about_the_game:
Assara is an ancient city built on the border between the human world and the world of genies. Once a year, the blooming gardens and golden spires bursting into the serene sky are plunged into darkness. This is the time of the Eclipse – the hour when the gates between the worlds open and humans and genies mix with each other on the colorful city streets. This is the time of the Festival of Masks, which symbolizes the eternal union between the children of Sol.

But under the cover of the holiday, there are dark secrets that threaten the well-being of the city. Mavi, a young nun, arrives in Assara to investigate the disappearance of the famous inventor and finds herself involved in a confrontation between the Church and apostates plotting to change the centuries-old way of life.

What awaits you on your journey:

Colorful 2D graphics with oriental motifs

Stroll through the Central Bazaar, visit the temples, and admire the stained-glass windows in the quaint houses of the old quarter. Assara's architecture is incredibly diverse; it combines features of several architectural styles of the Middle East and the Mediterranean.

Author's setting

Touch the history of the Sol Valley, a flourishing land blessed by the Sun. The world of Path For The Seeker is rich in myths and legends. They are everywhere: in temple frescoes, in festival theaters. Explore them and unravel the ancient secrets – who knows what the tales of the mysterious Gates behind which the genies dwell may hide?

A unique Mind System

Find the answers within yourself. On her journey, Mavi will encounter many difficult decisions that she must reflect on. Organize your thoughts, choose only what is most important, but remember – thoughts shape reality.
